column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Pork belly (3.5/5): if you're not big on fatty meats
column2: pork belly isn't the right choice for you. I typically stay away from pork belly as well because it's overly fatty for my taste
column4: this was a great dish. The pork belly is marinated in a wonderful Asian sauce and served with a side of kim chi.
